name: Aversion
description:
Story

  • The story goes beyond a girl named Iris. In her journey, Iris confronts a powerful event that almost ruined her life to the worst; finding herself fighting between her life and death.

  • Iris woke up to the sound of screeching tires and crunching metal. She had been driving home from work when a car ran a red light and slammed into her sedan. The impact sent her car spinning, and Iris's head hit the steering wheel with a sickening crack. She felt like she was floating in a sea of darkness, unable to move or speak.

  • As she slowly came to, she realized that she was pinned inside her car, her legs trapped beneath the dashboard. She could feel her blood dripping down her face, and her vision was blurry. She tried to call out for help, but her voice was barely a whisper.

  • Iris tried to nod, but her neck was too hurt. She could feel her consciousness slipping away, and she knew she had to stay awake. She took a deep breath and focused on the sound of the other driver's voice.

  • Iris closed her eyes and gritted her teeth, determined to fight for her life. She could hear the sirens in the distance, and she knew that she just had to hold on a little longer. She could feel her strength waning, but she refused to give up. She was going to make it through this, no matter what.

Hero Definition

  • Iris, a protagonist brave little girl who confronts a powerful fate; finding herself through a challenging events to fight for.

Key Features!

  • Exploration: A beautiful eye-popping garden filled with hidden mysteries to descover.
  • Dynamic Modes: Dynamic 1ST Person / 3RD Person modes related to the story.
  • Memory Fractions: Structure memories through the garden, the more you assemble the more you remember.
  • Collectibles: A rewarding collectible system, gather a collection and be rewarded!
  • Chapter Select: After completing the story, revisit any chapter you want and collect any missable items.
